channel.title: Pernix-RsPs --- We are back
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1O2v0Pb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [URL=http://pernix-rsps.com]Runescape private server[/URL]
[video=youtube;vjEsSsLUcO4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vjEsSsLUcO4[/video] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iSyYxLi.png[/img]
-Duo Slayer -Target system -Dwarf Multi-cannon -Bank Tabs -Switchable gameframes -Client settings -Money Pouch -Revenant cave -Killsteam system -Player user titles -Curses/quick prayers -Full summoning with working specials -All skills trainable with their own skilling zone -Stable economy -Pking is fun, and worth value -Trivia Bots -Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles -Great shops to fulfill the needs of players -Working clue scrolls -Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking -Great pvm community -Unique barrows with interface -Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports -63 wave jad, log out between waves supported
------And of course many more, these are just the core features that make Pernix unique!--------
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WnU8Wb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Nzaqji2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r24tXN6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3bixJab.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jIAKFHe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pc6ec2j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rXzEvBf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bHzTSCU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Nv2PY3E.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kZNPHi0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VnvQlzG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JZR3P0g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ODjIwUv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oTyADcw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [URL=http://pernix-rsps.com/mopar.php]Pernix-Rsps | Home[/URL]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Pernix-RsPs --- We are back
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I see that the server has some content in it. I wouldn’t go as far as to say the content is truly unique but it is content nonetheless. It basically feels like a mediocre server, nothing jumps out to me in all honesty.

Polish up your thread a little bit, add some more media which emphasises that your server is different from the rest and maybe this could be a decent server, who knows.

Goodluck with this

Read full topic

item.title: Pernix-RsPs --- We are back
item.dc:creator: @nexile nexile
item.description:
@nexile wrote:

[CENTER]

Website: [URL=http://pernix-rsps.com]Runescape private server[/URL]

[video=youtube;vjEsSsLUcO4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vjEsSsLUcO4[/video]

-Duo Slayer
-Target system
-Dwarf Multi-cannon
-Bank Tabs
-Switchable gameframes
-Client settings
-Money Pouch
-Revenant cave
-Killsteam system
-Player user titles
-Curses/quick prayers
-Full summoning with working specials
-All skills trainable with their own skilling zone
-Stable economy
-Pking is fun, and worth value
-Trivia Bots
-Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles
-Great shops to fulfill the needs of players
-Working clue scrolls
-Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking
-Great pvm community
-Unique barrows with interface
-Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports
-63 wave jad, log out between waves supported

------And of course many more, these are just the core features that make Pernix unique!--------













Website: [URL=http://pernix-rsps.com/mopar.php]Pernix-Rsps | Home[/URL]
